price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ababangikanyamana, ntibazokwigera bakuzanira iciyumviro gitera abantu amazinda mu kwemera ukuri wazanye, kiretse ko Twebwe Allah Tuzoguha inyishu y’ukuri kandi itomoye bikwiye mu kubeshuza nya ciyumviro.
arabic: وَلَا يَأۡتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَحۡسَنَ تَفۡسِيرًا

meta.transliteration: walā yatūnaka bimathalin illā ji'nāka bil-ḥaqi wa-aḥsana tafsīran
